about_the_game:
Elysia Fernwhisper is depressed. During the “War of the Crescent Lakes” she was a Captain of a an Elite Ranger Platoon but with the war now over she’s been discharged and given a plot of land to farm as a reward for her bravery and loyalty to the Kingdom. Only problem is, Elysia hates farming and yearns for her adventurous life of old! On top of that her girlfriend has just left her and with her ongoing depression on account of her hating her work, she’s feeling the need for the love of a woman in her life more and more! One fine day, her best friend Valeria Dawnstriker comes a knocking on her door with a job that will change both their lives forever.

“The Queen’s Quest” is a fantasy point-and-click adventure game and Yuri dating sim. Play as Elysia Fernwhisper as she goes on an epic quest for Queen Drusilla, travels around her vast Kingdom and learns a mysterious truth that will change her life forever. Along the way she will meet beautiful women and may even have a chance to fall in love!

Featuring:

- An epic fantasy storyline
- Charming folk and orchestral music
- 3 Romanceable Waifus
- Beautiful medieval fantasy scenery

About the Game

Elysia Fernwhisper is depressed. Minimum:

short_description: “The Queen’s Quest” is a fantasy point-and-click adventure game and Yuri dating sim. Play as Elysia Fernwhisper as she goes on an epic quest for Queen Drusilla that takes her across her vast and majestic kingdom. Along the way she will meet many beautiful women and may even fall in love!
